label.de-DE: Shopware ERP & CRM extension (All-In-One Edition powered by xentral) für Shopware 6
label.en-GB: Shopware ERP & CRM extension (All-In-One Edition powered by xentral) for Shopware 6

description.de-DE: Mit der Shopware E-Commerce Edition - powered by xentral, stehen Euch 100 Apps in nur einer All-In-One-Edition zur Verfügung: Versand, Labels, Abo, CRM, Retouren, Buchhaltung, Warenwirtschaft u.v.w.
description.en-GB: With the Shopware E-Commerce Edition - powered by xentral, 100 apps are available in just one All-In-One-Edition: shipping, labels, subscription, CRM, returns, accounting, merchandise management and much more.
